attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: STOP GORDON BROWN TAKING OVER AS PRIME MINISTER. HE WAS NOT ELECTED BY THE PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY AS LEADER,THAT WAS UNFORTUNATELY TONY BLAIR. IF TONY STANDS DOWN THERE SHOULD BE A GENERAL ELECTION.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
